backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing item, basket, user, branding, and Stripe state plus authorization and storage mixins with basket add/remove/query logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state and returning prior state unchanged for upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing routing, components, admin tools, and storefront behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring routes, layout, header with basket and login, footer, theming, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a non-admin accesses restricted pages, offering navigation back to storefront.
Admin editor allowing updating an item's description and replacing its image with validation and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublishTogg: Provides a button and status badge allowing admins to publish or unpublish an item with loading states and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item’s image, title, description, price, and sold badge, and navigates to the item detail page when clicked.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and shows admin-specific menu options when the user is an admin.
frontend/src/components/Model3DViewer.ts: Renders a 3D model using three.js with orbit controls, fallback UI, and basic error handling.
frontend/src/components/PriceEditor.tsx: Allows admins to edit an item’s price with validation and saves changes via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeroMe: Displays a hero section using either a 3D model or background image along with dynamic title and subtitle text.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for entering Stripe secret key and allowed countries, saving configuration via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBasket.ts: Manages a localStorage-backed basket of item IDs with add, remove, clear, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as items, profiles, admin checks, and pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: Implements React Query hooks for Stripe-related backend operations like configuration, checkout sessions, and session status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, typography, and theme customization for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/idEncoding.ts: Utility functions for encoding and decoding item IDs between Uint8Array and URL‑safe base64 strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin interface for editing branding assets, hero media, and app text with file upload and preview support.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBulkUploadPage.t: Admin page for bulk uploading images, tracking progress, verifying uploads, and updating item caches.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin dashboard showing Stripe configuration status and navigation to branding settings, with gated access based on admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/BasketPage.tsx: Displays basket items, handles removing items and checkout flow, and validates item availability and Stripe configuration.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows item details with purchase, basket, and admin edit options, including Stripe checkout and media handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Payment cancellation screen offering navigation back to the storefront or basket.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms successful payment, clears basket, refreshes item data, and allows returning to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Loads and displays storefront hero media and a grid of available items with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/brandingMedia.ts: Validates uploaded hero media, infers content type, and builds media descriptors for images and 3D models.
frontend/src/utils/bulkUploadVerificatio: Verifies bulk-uploaded items by fetching each one and confirming its associated image is accessible.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project state, requirements, features, architectural notes, and known issues for the storefront and admin system.
